abstract: A loose-knit coalition of hackers around the world defeated the antipiracy software protecting several high-resolution movies in the HD DVD format and began distributing copies of the films.
snippet: A loose-knit coalition of hackers around the world defeated the antipiracy software protecting several high-resolution movies in the HD DVD format and began distributing copies of the films.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 16  The 2005 science fiction film “Serenity” portrayed a ragtag crew of space pirates fighting to unravel the mysteries of their galaxy.

headline.main: A DVD Copy Protection Is Overcome by Hackers
headline.print_headline: A DVD Copy Protection Is Overcome by Hackers
